name: StarGazer2024
title: Animal Shelter Volunteer
description: Spend your morning helping out at the local animal shelter. Duties include feeding, cleaning, and providing companionship to the animals.

name: TechWhi88
title: Coding Workshop for Kids
description: Volunteer to help teach kids the basics of coding in a fun and interactive environment. No prior teaching experience needed, just a passion for technology and helping others.
